titles.title: A bill to require that national cemeteries be open to visitors on legal public holidays.
A bill to require that national cemeteries be open to visitors on legal public holidays.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill requires that national cemeteries administered by the Department of Defense, Department of Veterans Affairs, or the National Park Service must be open to visitors on the 11 legal public holidays (e.g., Memorial Day).
